english.segment1: can't hold you down. can I be you. there's nothing I can do. a slave to your hands
english.segment2: climb up above. your precious time. don't worry your time. don't hurry your mind
english.segment3: where did you go. where did you hide. all I can do. is watch you pass by
english.segment4: climb up above. your precious time. don't worry your time. don't hurry your mind
english.segment5: everytime I try to take it back. I know I don't wanna live like that. I'll wait for tomorrow. too tired to go the other way. too late to wait another day. I'm going on
english.segment6: climb up above. your precious time. don't worry your time. don't hurry your mind
english.segment7: climb up above. your precious time. don't worry your time. don't hurry your mind
